mapper.sql: BOARD_NUM as boardNum, CLASS_NUM as classNum, STUDENT_NUM as studentNum, TEACHER_NUM as teacherNum , WRITE_NUM as writeNum, BOARD_NAME as boardName, BOARD_CONTENTS as boardContents, BOARD_DATE as boardDate
mapper.insert: insert into board(BOARD_NUM, CLASS_NUM, STUDENT_NUM, TEACHER_NUM, BOARD_NAME, BOARD_CONTENTS, BOARD_DATE, BOARD_CATEGORY) values(#{boardNum}, #{classNum}, #{studentNum}, #{teacherNum}, #{boardName}, #{boardContents}, sysdate,#{boardCategory})
mapper.select: select BOARD_NUM as boardNum, BOARD_NAME as boardName, STUDENT_NUM as studentNum, teacher_num as teacherNum, BOARD_CONTENTS as boardContents, BOARD_CATEGORY as boardCategory from board where class_num = #{classNum} order by board_num asc
